drug.name: Poloxalene
drug.description: Ethylene oxide/propylene oxide copolymer is used as a food additive. It belongs to the family of Epoxides. These are compounds containing a cyclic ether with three ring atoms (one oxygen and two carbon atoms).

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as epoxides. These are compounds containing a cyclic ether with three ring atoms(one oxygen and two carbon atoms).

category.category: Compounds used in a research, industrial, or household setting
